title: New mobile
content:
Hi I'm chorasiya Vijay, comman citizen of india, actually today I written this because I need 5 inch/5.5inch display mobile or many people of india need that size.  In india approximately 20 to 30 crore people that have age of 30 to 40 years. They are busy in job or business. They want small display  mobile with good display, good camera and good battery life under 15k to 20k, But lack of availablity small display size in this budget they go for that long display size,
 working people those need good internal memory with better battery life. 
So my humble request to you please make a small display size mobile with more internal memory and better battery life, in 15k to 20k price
I'm gurantee to you India's market is yours.
Lots of people finding this type mobile.

Basic features like:
1. Battery 5000 mah or more
2. Internal memory 128 gb or      more
3. Just good Camera 
4. Display size 5 inch or maximum 5.5 inch
5. Light in weight and easy to one hand use
